scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n shell,blog,portfolio,resume -c green,cyan,blue,magenta "pnpm --filter shell dev" "pnpm --filter blog dev" "pnpm --filter portfolio dev" "pnpm --filter resume dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n shell,blog,portfolio,resume -c green,cyan,blue,magenta "pnpm -F shell dev" "pnpm -F blog run dev:mfe" "pnpm -F portfolio run dev:mfe" "pnpm -F resume run dev:mfe"
scripts.serve:shell: pnpm --filter shell build && pnpm --filter shell preview
scripts.serve:blog: pnpm --filter blog build && pnpm --filter blog preview
scripts.serve:portfolio: pnpm --filter portfolio build && pnpm --filter portfolio preview
scripts.serve:resume: pnpm --filter resume build && pnpm --filter resume preview
scripts.preview:all: pnpm build:preview && concurrently -n shell,blog,portfolio,resume -c green,cyan,blue,magenta "pnpm --filter shell preview" "pnpm --filter blog preview" "pnpm --filter portfolio preview" "pnpm --filter resume preview"
scripts.build:ghp: pnpm -F shell build:ghp && pnpm -F blog build:ghp && pnpm -F portfolio build:ghp && pnpm -F resume build:ghp && node scripts/collect-ghp.js
scripts.preview:ghp: pnpm build:ghp && pnpm dlx http-server dist_ghp -p 5050 -c-1
